projects.title: Humor Project
projects.description: An innovative web application designed to bring joy and laughter to users' daily lives. Use AI-generated humor captions to create and share funny images with friends.

projects.title: QuizzBee
projects.description: An engaging quiz application for iOS that challenges users with various categories of questions.

projects.title: CafeCraft
projects.description: A comprehensive web platform for coffee lovers to learn the ingredients of different types of coffee products.

projects.title: Gardening App
projects.description: A digital gardening companion that helps users plan, track, and maintain their gardens.

projects.title: EventRecommender
projects.description: An intelligent event discovery platform that recommends personalized events based on user preferences, location, and past attendance history.
